alert.note: Alert for Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 12:41AM PST until January 14 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge, Kings Canyon NP, Grant Grove Area, Sequoia NP and South End of the Upper Sierra Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM Friday to 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra
